component.name: fetchApi
component.script:
function main() as Void
regex = createObject("roRegex","\s+| +","gi") m.top.uri = regex.replaceAll(m.top.uri,"")
request = createObject("roUrlTransfer") request.setUrl( m.top.uri )
if left( m.top.uri,5 ) = "https" request.SetCertificatesFile("common:/certs/ca-bundle.crt") request.AddHeader("X-Roku-Reserved-Dev-Id", "") request.InitClientCertificates() End if : request.SetUrl( m.top.uri )
if m.top.method <> "" request.SetRequest(m.top.method) else request.SetRequest("GET") end if
if m.top.user <> "" and m.top.pass <> "" request.SetUserAndPassword( m.top.user,m.top.pass ) end if
if m.top.headers <> invalid for each item in m.top.headers request.AddHeader(item,m.top.headers[item]) end for end if
if m.top.body <> "" m.top.response = request.PostFromString(m.top.body) else m.top.response = request.GetToString() end if
end function
